name: DinosaurSounds
0:
”Alexa open Dinosaur Sounds”
”Alexa ask Dinosaur Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dinosaur sounds
des:
Unleash the prehistoric world with this skill, featuring a collection of sounds imagined from various dinosaurs. It's perfect for adding an adventurous and educational layer for anyone fascinated by these ancient creatures.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Dinosaur Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
